title: Claiming gifts?
body: So I'm using the new client and I can't seem to claim a gift it says is available for me, I checked loot, not there, no new icons added either, if it requires the old client, it won't let me login through that.

replies.body:
You can manually return to the legacy client if necessary.

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

You shouldn't have to open the notification though to get your content, and it should be ready to use.  I looked into this personally for you, and it looks like it was the Advanced Bots icon.   Thanks for helping test out that game mode.  :P
